Thanks for using XChanges Rate! This is first time You launch app, so let\'s introduce basic functions. Let\'s add Your first Snapshot. Click here. Glad that You added! Now click on it and remember next. One click is to update Snapshot data. Long click is to open Options.
This is the main control screen. There You can select the Exchanger(Coindesk, Bitpay, etc)… —>> Coin(Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc)… —>> and Currency. Of course if it\'s available. Also set History timestamp for the gorgeous diagram.
And You can save it for quick access. Try it Yourself. What about notifications, You can set them here. Now You\'re ready to go on.
